display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | End repeated table on PDF

AND.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
AND.name: config_info

ANF.caption: Table name
ANF.doc: Unique table name so you can add columns to it and end it.
ANF.name: table_name

ANG.caption: Repeating structure name
ANG.doc: The repeating structure this table is being repeated into.
ANG.name: repeating_structure_name

ANH.caption: Use table custom margins?
ANH.doc: If yes, below you will be able to set margins for your table element. Leave this field as "no" for a default display, will ignore any margin-related numbers below.
ANH.name: custom_margins

ANM.caption: Page break
ANM.doc: Choose if this element will try to enforce a new page before or after itself.
ANM.name: page_break

ANN.caption: Table layout
ANN.name: table_layout
ANN.options: Standard,No Borders,Header Line Only,Light Horizontal Lines,Strong Outer Border,Zebra,Light Horizontal Lines Without Header

ANO.caption: Into multi column
ANO.doc: "Yes" to insert this repeated table into a repeated multi column.
ANO.name: into_multi_column

ANP.caption: Multi column name
ANP.doc: The name of the multi column that this repeated table is being inserted into. Use this only with a multi column that is also being inserted into a repeating structure.
ANP.name: multi_column_name

ANQ.caption: Multi column width
ANQ.doc: Fit content will make the column have the width of their content. Fit available space will extend the column's width to all horizontal avaliable space in the page.
ANQ.name: multi_column_width

APO.caption: Fixed width size
APO.doc: Optional. If you select "Fixed width" in the dropdown above then you must specify a number here. Play with numbers to check the size, but know that the size here is in "points" not "pixels". You can search the web to know more about that unit of measure.
APO.name: fixed_width_column_size
